description: The message transmitted with the event and relevant attributes for signing and encryption.

encryptionKey.description: The encrypted AES key, which was used to symmetrically encrypt the transmitted message. The key must be encrypted with the public key of the eventReceiver using RSA with PKCS#1 v1.5 padding.

messageSignature.description: Signature of the message, to verify by whom the encrypted message has been created

message.description: The base64 representation of the first g-zipped and then encrypted original message. For encryption, the AES-GCM algorithm with a 256-bit key, a 96-bit initialization vector (IV), and a 128-bit authentication tag must be used.

publicKeyVersion.description: The version of the public key that was used to encrypt the encryptionKey.

signatureKeyVersion.description: The version of the signature key, that was used to sign the message.
